dmca.title: DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google
dmca.body:
Email
DMCA

From: "NFL Anti Piracy Investigator #2" 
To: legal-support@google.com, pages@google.com, removals@google.com
Date: Jan, 1/14/2012 16:52
Subject: Demand for Immediate Take Down - Notice of Infringing Activity - NFL Ref. 121759
Ticket Id: 946571369
Queue: Legal Removals - Web Search - DMCA
Show original
Please note that we have our signature on file with you

VIA EMAIL:

Demand for Immediate Take-Down: Notice of Infringing Activity

URL:             http://www.kozreload.info/p/canal2.html 
Case #:       121759 
Date:           15 January 2012

Dear Sir or Madam,

The National Football League (the â€œNFLâ€) has received information that the location listed above, which appears to be on servers under your control, is engaged in the unauthorized redistribution of television programs for which the NFL holds the copyright.   Specifically, the website offers links to unauthorized broadcasts of copyrighted NFL football games.

1. Identification of copyrighted work(s):

The NFL owns the copyrights in and to, inter alia, (a) NFL regular season and playoff game footage and (b) NFL Network copyrighted content (collectively, â€œNFL Copyrighted Contentâ€), including without limitation the material found at the location(s) listed below as well as duplicates of such material.

Copyright work(s):

Game:     New Orleans Saints v. San Francisco 49ers 
Date:        14 January 2012 
Time:        16:30 (Time Zone: EST) 
Channel:  FOX

Copyright owner: National Football League

2. Infringing material found at the following location(s):

http://www.kozreload.info/p/canal2.html (Stream links: http://www.dinozap.tv/live/1961/)

The above broadcasts are being made directly available for viewing at the above location without authorization of the copyright owner.

3. Statement of authority:

I hereby certify under penalty of perjury that the information in this notice is accurate and that I am authorized to act on behalf of the NFL, the copyright owner of the intellectual property rights.  I have a good faith belief that none of the materials or activities listed above have been authorized by the NFL, its agents, or the law.

We hereby give notice of these activities to you and request that you take expeditious action to remove or disable access to the material described above, and thereby prevent the illegal retransmission and distribution of this broadcast via your company's network.

We appreciate your cooperation in this matter. Please advise us regarding what actions you take.

Sincerely,

James Young 
Internet Investigator

on behalf of: 
National Football League 
345 Park Avenue 
New York, NY 10154 
United States of America



Original Message Follows:
------------------------
From: Donal Blaney 
Subject: Re: [#944322537] Your Request to Google
Date: Tue, 17 Jan 2012 11:14:17 +0000

> Dear Sirs
>  
> Thank you for your email.
>  
> The torrent links are:
>  
> www.hellotorrents.com/catalog/item/3417388
>  
> http://www.kat.ph/sexy-rich-chick-mobile-phone-found-by-irc-nerdz-xxx-pictures-fro-t196437.html
> www.binsearch.info/viewNFO.php?oid=30608609&server
>  
> http://www.btmon.com/Sexy.Rich.Chick.Mobile.Phone.Found.By.IRC.Nerdz.XXX.Pictures.Fro.torrent.html
>  
> http://www.kat.ph/sexy-rich-chick-mobile-phone-found-by-irc-nerdz-xxx-pictures-fro-t196437.html
>  
> http://nzbclub.com/nzb_view/217401/PrettybooBoyz_Sexy_Rich_Chick_Mobile_Phone_Found_By_IRC_Nerdz_XXX_Pictures_From_It_Sexy_Rich_Chick_Mobile_Phone_Found_By_IRC_Nerdz_XXX_Pictures_From_It_Prettyboo
>  
> www.fulldls.com/torrents/samantha-brook-crispin
>  
> http://www.queentorrent.com/?n=322051&t=sexy.rich.chick.mobile.phone.found.by.irc.nerdz.xxx.pictures.fro
>  
> http://www.torrentzap.com/torrent-downloads/samantha+brook+crispin
>  
> http://www.nutorrent.com/search/samantha+brook+crispin
>  
> http://www.kat.ph/sexy-rich-chick-mobile-phone-found-by-irc-nerdz-xxx-pictures-fro-t196437.html
>  
> Each of these URLs link to files that are the private property of AMP. They consist of private, personal and intimate pictures of her of a highly graphic, sexual nature that were stolen from her and have been posted online (including on these sites). Their continued publication and availability online through Google amounts to a clear breach of the terms of the anti-harassment injunction granted by the High Court in London.
>  
> AMP has become suicidal over this matter and it is critical that Google does what it can to remove any links to these pictures or anything that reveals her true identity.
>  
> To that end please also remove the following URLs and/or any search results that might lead to these URLs being able to be accessed:
>  
> http://cryptome.org/0005/AMP-v-Unknown.pdf
>  
> http://chillingeffects.org/N/88791
>  
> http://www.xydo.com/articles/42421901-photos_dmca_copyright_complaint_to_google
>  
> http://dataopedia.com/chillingeffects-org
>  
> http://cryptome.org/info/index.html
>  
> http://nyinayminproxy1.appspot.com/cryptome.org
>  
> http://page2rss.com/deb36db488f175511ebd77b98603b50f
>  
> http://www.scribd.com/doc/77476749/UK-Court-Order-of-Threat-to-Torrent-Seeders
>  
> Again, the publication and availability online through Google of anything that reveals AMPâ€™s true identity (which, for example, the Chilling Effects URL does on its final pages by appending to the anonymised court judgment her DCMA request which my firm filed in 2011 using her real name) amounts to a clear breach of the terms of the anti-harassment injunction granted by the High Court of London.
>  
> I very much understand that it is not easy for Google to remove these URLs or searches that might lead internet users to be able to access the photographs complained of or to unmask AMPâ€™s true identity. Equally, however, Google algorithms are programmed to prevent successful searches for information being made by paedophiles, terrorists or others intent on criminality. To that end the steps I have asked for clearly can be taken by Google.
>  
> There are occasions where standing up for freedom of expression is right and proper. I stand alongside Google in that regard 99.99% of the time. This, however, is not such a time. On a human level I hope that you can see why the continued harassment of AMP is causing her such trauma.
>  
> I therefore very much hope that in addition to taking the steps requested you can suggest a way in which I might be able to liaise more effectively with you to have any further breaches of such an order addressed as quickly as possible.
>  
> Yours faithfully
>  
> Donal Blaney
> Director & Principal
> Griffin Law, Solicitors & Commissioners for Oaths
> 
> LONDON:
> 25 Southampton Buildings
> London WC2A 1AL
> Tel: +44 (0)20 7152 6558

> 
> Wouldn't you like the scales of justice tilted in your favour for once?
> 
> Service by fax, email or other electronic means not accepted.
> 
> This e-mail is confidential and may also be privileged. If you are not the intended recipient, please notify the sender immediately. You should not copy it or disclose its contents to any other person.
> 
> Internet communications cannot be guaranteed to be secure or error free as information could be intercepted, corrupted, lost, arrive late or contain viruses. The sender does not accept liability for any errors or omissions in the context of this message which arise as a result of internet transmission. If we receive a request from you via e-mail we will treat that as authority to reply by e-mail.
> 
> Griffin Law, Solicitors & Commissioners for Oaths is the trading name of Griffin Law Limited, incorporated in England & Wales (registration no. 07684515). Registered Office: 10 Churchill Square, Kings Hill, West Malling, Kent ME19 4YU. Registration No: 971 5442 10
> 
> Griffin Law Limited is registered with the Law Society of England & Wales and authorised and regulated by the Solicitors Regulation Authority (registration no. 562221)
> 
> On 12 Jan 2012, at 22:34, The Google Team wrote:
> 
> > Hello,
> > 
> > Thanks for reaching out to us.
> > 
> > We are in receipt of your complaint sent on January 11th, 2012. Please
> > note that we will require the exact URLs containing the content specified
> > in your court order in order to respond to your request. In a reply to
> > this email, please list the exact URLs containing the content along with a
> > brief explanation of how the content on each URL relates to the content
> > ordered to be removed in this legal document.
> > 
> > Once we have this information, we will continue processing your request.
> > 
> > Regards,
> > 
> > The Google Team
> > 
> >

> >> 
> >> There is an English High Court order in place which is being breached by
> > 
> >> the use of your systems.  You have it within your power to prevent this 
> > 
> >> breach in the following way: Block all searches which contain the name
> > of  
> >> AMP and the following words: Sexy, Pictures, Mobile Phone, AMP.
> >> 
> >> We appreciate that you are not parties to this action and we do not
> > intend  
> >> to hold you liable for any loss suffered as a result of these breaches
> > but  
> >> we reserve our right to obtain an order to compel you to take the steps
> > we  
> >> have outlined above.
> >> 
> >> We do not believe, however that this is proportionate or necessary as I
> > am  
> >> sure you will be able to assist us.
> >> 
> >> You will, of course be aware that that this case involves the personal
> > and  
> >> sexual images of a young lady which were stolen from her and uploaded to
> > 
> >> the internet. Any effort you could make to assist in preventing the
> > further  
> >> dissemination of these images would be gratefully appreciated.
> >> 
> >> Yours faithfully
> >>

The following message has been automatically forwarded to your
address for consultation, based on the contents of the message.

Replies to this message will be returned to the Trakken system,
and not sent to the customer.  A customer service agent will review
the information you provide, and compose a response to the customer,
if necessary.

For more information on this ticket, click the link below:
http://trax/html/trax.html?ticket_id=949306621

Thanks for your help.

The text of the message follows, and the full message is attached.
